Hey_Romeo:
{{Short description|Music band}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Hey Romeo | image = | caption = | image_size = | alias = Udder Maddness | origin = [[Edmonton]], [[Alberta]], Canada | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = 2002–present | label = Icon, [[Royalty Records]] | associated_acts = | website = {{Official website|http://www.heyromeo.com}} | current_members = Darren Gusnowsky
Rob Shapiro | past_members = Stacie Roper }} '''Hey Romeo''' is a Canadian [[country music]] trio from [[Edmonton]], [[Alberta]]. The band's members are Stacie Roper (vocals), Darren Gusnowsky (guitar) and Rob Shapiro (keyboard). Their 2007 single "Second Hand News", a cover of the 1977 [[Fleetwood Mac]] song, reached the Top 50 on the ''[[Radio & Records]]'' Canadian country-singles chart.{{cite web|url=https://secure4.worldsites.net/countrymusicnews-ca/news.ihtml?step=2&article_id=1356 |title=CD Review - ''Hey Romeo'' |publisher=[[Country Music News]] |accessdate=2009-10-31 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://archive.today/20110721214820/https://secure4.worldsites.net/countrymusicnews-ca/news.ihtml?step=2&article_id=1356 |archivedate=2011-07-21 }} Hey Romeo was named Top New Talent of the Year - Group or Duo at the 2008 [[Canadian Country Music Association]] awards.{{cite web|url=http://jos.thatscountry.com/index.php/associations/ccma/397-2008-ccma-award-winners-announced |title=2008 CCMA Award Winners Announced |author=Marti Clayton |date=2008-09-09 |publisher=That's Country |accessdate=2009-10-31 }}{{dead link|date=April 2017 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} Stacie Roper, the lead singer, died on May 8, 2023. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! style="width:12em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''Hey Romeo'' | * Release date: June 18, 2007 * Label: Icon Records |- ! scope="row"| ''That's What I Am'' | * Release date: June 1, 2010 * Label: [[Royalty Records]] |- ! scope="row"| ''Twist of Fate'' | * Release date: June 26, 2012 * Label: Royalty Records |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! style="width:12em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''I Got This, Vol. 1'' | * Release date: September 9, 2014 * Label: Royalty Records |- ! scope="row"| ''Ride with Me'' | * Release date: September 25, 2015 * Label: Royalty Records |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:16em;"| Single !
